overview: Meet best buddies Bella the laid-back cat, Bagel the goofy dog, and Alvin the opinionated parrot. This hilarious trio loves to watch the best show on TV, Pets! Grab the popcorn and join these three cushion-loving furballs for yet another afternoon to remember in Pets Season 2!
tagline: the funniest pets in the world are back!
title: Pets Season 2
